Belgium: Holy Roman Emperor Arnulf of Carinthia appoints his illegitimate son Zwentibold as king of Lotharingia.
Germany: Arnulf of Carinthia appointed his illegitimate son Zwentibold king of Lotharingia.
Slovenia: Accord between Arnulf of Carinthia and the Bohemian Duke Bořivoj (reigned 870–895), Bohemia is freed from the danger of invasion.
